title: The Sky Crawlers (Dub)
alternative_title: The Sky Crawlers; スカイ・クロラ
description: The Sky Crawlers is based on a Japanese novel series by Hiroshi Mori. First published by Chuōkōron-shinsha in June 2001 and spanning five books, it follows the journeys and tribulations of a group of young fighter pilots involved in dogfight warfare, and is set during an alternate historical period.
